Title: Relates to requiring services provided by telehealth reimbursed at the same rate as an in-office visit
Summary: Requires services provided by telehealth be reimbursed at the same rate as an in-office visit.
LawCode: Amd §2999-dd, Pub Health L; amd §§3217-h & 4306-g, Ins L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law and the insurance law, in relation to requiring services provided by telehealth reimbursed at the same rate as an in-office visit
